front.title: Autonomic SRv6 Network Fast Failover Using Bounce-back Strategy with GRASP

author.organization: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

abstract.t: This document specifies an autonomic fast failover mechanism for SRv6 networks using a bounce-back strategy. It uses GRASP to distribute failover protection information, enabling data plane fast reroute without control plane reconvergence.
